pull.title: gui: Fix incorrect application name when passing -regtest
pull.body:
Changes the application name to `Bitcoin-Qt-regtest` when instead of `Bitcoin-Qt-testnet`

Fixes #15079

events.message: gui: Fix for Incorrect application name when passing -regtest

rename.from: gui: Fix for Incorrect application name when passing -regtest
rename.to: gui: Fix incorrect application name when passing -regtest

events.body:
utACK cc341adbbb7584d3110a5151baf1ba4053aa2ed1

As this affects the QSettings name, this does result in the first launch of `bitcoin-qt -regtest` to start with cleared settings, but as regtest is for temporary testing this is not something that needs to be noted in the release notes IMO.
